body: It would be great.....but its another random guy gross shit as ever
He should of grabbed her tail like every other neko girl :D

Oh, and to clarify, I meant that there seemed to be an aversion more on the "western" side of things, as the actual number of works is split pretty evenly between rape/Netori/Netorare/etc., and Haruhiko x Anyone (mostly Mai) on the whole. It's just that the already scarce English translations have yet to include any of those other works.

P.S.
Just to make sure, "fgt" IS supposed to mean "faggot" right? I can't help but think of Sgt. Frog for some reason, though....
v guy down theres a fgt v

I just don't understand the aversion people seem to have towards Haruhiko. There are a number of rape, Netori, and Netorare doujinshi for Musaigen no Phantom World, and here we have one of the few vanilla types, yet instead of an actual character from the series, it has a random, unnamed underclassman paired with Mai. I can't be the only one who actually likes Haruhiko as a character, but it seems that way at times...
10/10 for that mole on her face
